plot: Stand-up comedian Rodney Carrington would like to take you to the middle of real, everyday America. In the tradition of &"Home Improvement&" and &"Roseanne&" comes a down-to-earth guy's guy who, with his own heartland intelligence, speaks the truth. Rodney is quitting or getting fired from jobs he hates while doing stand-up in dive bars at night. He may not have much money, but he still finds excitement. He's not afraid to walk into a department store naked on a dare. Not afraid to take credit for flowers someone else sent his wife. Not afraid to get between his fighting boys. Not afraid to tell his wife he wants to make stand-up his career. He's going to figure out how to find happiness while being the best damn husband, dad and son he knows how to be.   Written by  Anonymous
keywords: Actor Shares First Name With Character
